Package com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.service.veterinarian

Interface IVeterinarianService

All Known Implementing Classes:
VeterinarianService
public interface IVeterinarianService
Interface for Veterinarian service, providing methods for managing and retrieving veterinarian-related data.

  • Method Details

    • getAllVeterinariansWithDetails

      List<UserDto> getAllVeterinariansWithDetails()
      Retrieves a list of all veterinarians along with their detailed information.
      Returns:
      a list of UserDto containing detailed information about veterinarians.

    • getVeterinarianWithDetailsAndReview

      UserDto getVeterinarianWithDetailsAndReview(Long vetId)
      Retrieves detailed information about a veterinarian, including their photo and reviews.

      This method:

      • Fetches a veterinarian by their ID, ensuring their photo is loaded.
      • Throws an exception if the veterinarian is not found.
      • Converts the veterinarian entity into a UserDto.
      • Enriches the UserDto with review details, including average rating and total number of reviews.
      Parameters:
      vetId - the ID of the veterinarian.
      Returns:
      a UserDto containing veterinarian details, photo, and reviews.

    • getSpecializations

      List<String> getSpecializations()
      Retrieves a list of all available specializations for veterinarians.
      Returns:
      a list of strings representing the available specializations.

    • findAvailableVeterinariansForAppointments

      List<UserDto> findAvailableVeterinariansForAppointments(String specialization, LocalDate date, LocalTime time)
      Finds available veterinarians for appointments based on specialization, date, and time.
      Parameters:
      specialization - the specialization required for the appointment.
      date - the date of the requested appointment.
      time - the time of the requested appointment.
      Returns:
      a list of UserDto for veterinarians available at the specified date and time.

    • aggregateVetsBySpecialization

      List<Map<String,Object>> aggregateVetsBySpecialization()
      Aggregates the number of veterinarians by their specializations.
      Returns:
      a list of maps, where each map contains a specialization and the corresponding count of veterinarians.

    • getAvailableTimeForBookAppointment

      List<LocalTime> getAvailableTimeForBookAppointment(Long vetId, LocalDate date)
      Retrieves available time slots for booking an appointment with a veterinarian on a specific date.
      Parameters:
      vetId - the ID of the veterinarian.
      date - the date for which available time slots are requested.
      Returns:
      a list of LocalTime objects representing the available time slots for the specified veterinarian.

    • getVeterinarians

      List<UserDto> getVeterinarians()
      Retrieves a list of all veterinarians as UserDto objects.
      Returns:
      a list of UserDto representing all veterinarians in the system.
